assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: LGB receives royalties from Genentech and honoraria from Wiley-Blackwell and is an uncompensated advisor to the Illumina Corp. AJG holds U.S. patents: 7 166 433 (Transductin-2 and Applications to Hereditary Deafness), 7 192 705 (Transductin-1 and Applications to Hereditary Deafness), and 7 659 115 (Nucleic Acid Encoding Human Transductin-1 Polypeptide) and has a pending licensing agreement with EMD/Millipore for anti-TMC antibodies.

publisher: Springer Science and Business Media LLC
